text: Carron fort is a ringfort (rath) and National Monument located in County Tipperary, Ireland.http://www.archaeology.ie/sites/default/files/media/pdf/monuments-in- state-care-limerick.pdf ==Location== Carron fort is located 1.6 km (1 mile) east of Limerick Junction. ==Description== Carron fort is a trivallate rath. ==References== Category:Archaeological sites in County Tipperary Category:National Monuments in County Tipperary
title: Carron fort
